resources.string: 전체 상태 정보를 펼치기 위한 화살표.
이 게임은 1인 개발자가 사랑과 인내심을 가지고 만들었습니다 :)&br;&br;저는 당신의 의견을 듣고 싶습니다! 연제든지 연락하여 아이디어와 제안을 해주세요.&br;&br;당신이 모험을 즐기길 바랍니다!
(당신은 무작위 제작 레시피, &font_cyan;경험치&font_end;물약 그리고 5 &font_cyan;스킬&font_end;포인트를 갖고 시작합니다)
(당신은 &font_cyan;1 &font_end;가지 타입의 물약 제작 능력 그리고 &font_cyan;3 &font_end;개의 무작위 재료를 가지고 시작합니다)
&font_red;&bold;PERMADEATH&bold_end;&font_end; 모드가 선택되었습니다.&br;&br;당신이 &font_red;사망&font_end;한다면, 당신은 &font_cyan;모든걸 잃습니다. &font_end;그리고 당신은 &font_cyan;새롭게 시작해야합니다&font_end;!

&font_red;&bold;NO PERMADEATH&bold_end;&font_end; 모드가 선택되었습니다.&br;&br;당신이 사망한다면, 당신은 &font_primary_light;&italic;[저장된 체크포인트] &italic_end;&font_end;에서 다시 시작할 수 있습니다.(&font_inn;여관&font_end;에서 쉬거나, &font_cyan;레벨 업&font_end;을 하면 &font_primary_light;&italic;[저장된 체크포인트]&italic_end;&font_end;가 생성됩니다.).
%1$s을(를) 주울 수 없습니다, 인벤토리가 꽉 찼습니다!

&font_purifying;정화의&font_end; &font_plant;씨앗을 &font_end;심을까요?&br;&br;한번 &font_wood;나무&font_end; &font_purifying;정화&font_end;을(를) 시작하면, 섬에 몬스터들이 생기는 것을 막아줍니다.&br;&br;물을 줘야하는걸 기억하세요. &font_water;물&font_end; &font_iron;양동이 &font_end;로 자라게 하세요.
어떤 마법의 힘이 심는 것을 막습니다… (이 섬은 이미 정화되었습니다…)
어떤 마법의 힘이 심는 것을 막습니다… (이 섬은 &font_purifying;정화의&font_end; &font_plant;씨앗 &font_end;이 이미 심어졌습니다…)
&font_purifying;정화의&font_end; &font_plant;씨앗 &font_end;이 마법의 힘으로 &font_purifying;정화의&font_end; &font_wood;나무가 &font_end;되었습니다! 당신은 섬이 정화 되었다는걸 느낍니다.
당신은 &font_purifying;정화의&font_end; &font_wood;나무&font_end;를 잘랐습니다. 이 섬은 더이상 정화되지 않습니다, 몬스터들이 다시 소환됩니다…
이 섬은 더 이상 정화되지 않습니다… 당신은 악의 기운을 다시 느낍니다…
이것을 사용하여 &font_stone;돌을 캐서&font_end; &font_stone;돌&font_end;이나 다른 재료를 얻으세요.
이것을 &font_attack;캠프파이어&font_end;에 조리하고 먹을 수 있게 하세요.
이것을 사용하여 어떠한 무기의 공격력과 지능 스탯을 바꾸세요.
이것을 사용하여 가장 최근에 묵었던 &font_inn;여관 &font_end;이나 당신의 &font_cyan;섬&font_end;에서 시작점으로 이동하세요.
&font_cyan;지도 조각&font_end;. 더 많은 조각을 찾아내야 할 것입니다…
&font_attack;화염&font_end; &font_bomb;폭탄 &font_end;을 적에게 던져서 피해를 주세요. 또한 적이 &font_attack;화상&font_end;을 입을 수 있습니다.
&font_ice;얼음&font_end; &font_bomb;폭탄 &font_end;을 적에게 던져서 피해를 주세요. 또한 적이 &font_ice;동상&font_end;에 걸릴 수 있습니다.
&font_electric;전기 &font_end;&font_bomb;폭탄 &font_end;을 적에게 던져서 피해를 주세요. 또한 적이 &font_electric;마비&font_end;될 수 있습니다.

이것을 심고 &font_water;물&font_end; &font_iron;양동이 &font_end;로 물을 주어서 &font_purifying;정화의&font_end; &font_wood;나무&font_end;로 자라게 하세요.&br;&br;&font_purifying;정화의&font_end; &font_wood;나무&font_end;는 섬에서 몬스터 &italic;소환&italic_end;을 막습니다.
이것은 &font_gold;왕의 문장&font_end;입니다. 당신은 &font_gold;왕&font_end;에게 가져다 주어야 합니다.
더 많은 펫을 가질 수 없습니다!

I need help with something…
 Can I ask you for a favor?
 I'd be grateful if you could help me…
 Could you help me with something?
 You look like someone who can help!
 If you aren't busy, I'd need something from you…
 Could you please help?
 Could you please help me?
 My family and I would be grateful if you could help us…
 My family and I need something…

 Would you be so kind to help me?
 Could you help me out?
 I'm afraid I must ask you for a favor…
 If it isn't much to ask, I need you to do something…
 Could you please help me with something?
 Could you give me a hand?
 We need help with something…
 We need to ask you for a favor…
 I know we haven't met before, but I must ask you for a favor…
 I've had this problem for a long time and I could use your help with it…
 We aren't used to having strangers around here… Can I ask you for a favor?
 We aren't used to having strangers around here… Can you do me a favor?
 You are not from around here, are you? Can you do something for me?
 You are not from around here, are you? May I ask you for a favor?
 Where do you come from? Is it too much if I ask you for this…
 Ah, if it isn't much trouble, could you help me with something?
 I am in trouble and would really appreciate some help. Would you be willing to help?
 Before you leave, could you help with something? It's a matter of vital importance…
 Before you leave, could you help me?
 Before you leave, would you help me?
 Before you go, could you help me?
 Before you go, would you help me?
 Before you go, please can you do me a favor?
 Can you help with something?
 Can you help me out with something, please?
 Can you help me with something, please?
 I heard you are a good hero. Would you help me please?

Buy more, buy more now. Buy and be happy.
 Our time is yours.
 Do it for the fat lady.
 From this moment we travel together East. Always to the East.
 Stay away from normal people. They're stupid.
 To what do we owe the extreme pleasure of this surprising visit?
 Klaatu barada nikto.
 Wake up, we're here. Why are you shaking? Are you okay?
 Your mission was to retrieve Dr. Durand Durand from Tau Ceti!
 Out here on the perimeter there are no stars.
 I only can see in black and white…
 I don't know why you gotta be so undemanding.
 You need chaos inside to give birth to a dancing star.
 Involving yourself in status quo creativity is counter-revolutionary!

 No eternal reward will forgive us now for wasting the dawn.
 Can't live without a spinal cord, son.
 Kain refused the sacrifice.
 Now how about cuttin the rebop?
 There may be other universes, but ours seems to be based on war and games.
 Silence, experience shows, is what terrifies people most.
 If ever told to look at yourself…never look.
 Never create anything. It will be misinterpreted. It will chain you and follow you for the rest of your life. It will never change.
 All these worlds are yours except Europa. Attempt no landing there.
 Pay no attention to the man behind the curtain.
 Light all the fires, it's the king and he's coming home!
 You got more front than Brighton, coming back here!
 Sent out like sheep into the midst of wolves, be shrewd as serpents and innocent as doves.
 Specialization is for insects.
 I put on my robe and wizard hat.
 Why do I climb the mountain? Because I'm in love.
 One day I saw a child playing with a ruby the size of a tangerine.
 Are you the keymaster?
 If you lived here, you'd be home now.
 Stop your grinnin' and drop your linen.

 You look like hell.
 Gimme respect.
 S…s…senpai?
 Did I do thaaaaaat?
 Meep.
 Make sure to subscribe, retweet, like, share, and upvote this! Wait… What was I talking about?
 Two beers or not two beers, that's the question…
 What can I do, sometimes…
 Are you afraid to get dirty?
 What does breaking the 4th wall mean?
 AVADA KEDAVRA! …oops, wrong spell!
 Respect my authority!
 It could be worse, I could be at the hospital!
 Potatoes make French fries, chips and vodka. It's like the other vegetables aren't even trying…
 I found a scroll of stupidity yesterday, you should have it…
 On that day, mankind received a grim reminder…
 I'm going to kill them all… every single one.
 Everything is impossible until someone does it.
 I have a cool bruise on my leg, do you want to see it?
 Everything is an adventure if you're always lost.
 All those moments will be lost in time, like tears in rain.
 Eat cheese or perish.
 I'm here to kick gum and chew butt…wait, that's not right…
 I'm against crime, and I'm not ashamed to admit it.
 We all make choices in life, but in the end, our choices make us.
 A man who praises a man to his face is full of ulterior motives.
 I have no quest for you, farewell peasant.
 Kids, don't do bugs.
 Who is X and what is he going to give me?
 You will die here.
 I hate Common Cold, but with my luck, I think its at least Epic Cold.
 Just another lone soul seeking a purpose.
 A place that needs a hero is not a good place.
 Stand and deliver.
 We are all Stardust.
 I know the ways of the potato.
 Help! I'm stuck in a video game!
 Good thing I'm not an NPC, that would suck.
 I used to be an adventurer like you, but then I took an arrow to the knee.
 Sometimes, I dream about cheese.
 Error obtaining a quote;
 I wonder what that green light on the other side of the water is.
 Hmmmmmmmmmmm.
 Coss a toin to your Witcher.
 I kick ass for the Lord!
 Have you seen Archison? I need to talk to him about getting off this stupid island.
 What is a man but a miserable pile of secrets?
 Don't focus too much on the game or you'll take the wrong bus.

안녕.. 내가 &font_witch;마녀 모자&font_end;를 줄게. 만약 너가 &font_cyan;%1$d&font_end;개의 &font_mushroom;버섯&font_end;을 준다면… 아니면 너를 쥐로 바꾸어 버릴거야!
%1$s로 온것을 환영하오… 당신은 나 같은 &font_mana;마법사&font_end;가 되고 싶소?
%1$s로 다시 돌아온것을 환영하오… 아! 자네구만, 나는 이미 &font_mana;주문&font_end;책을 주었다네… 다른 마법은 스스로 배우게나…
그러면, 돌아가고 나의 시간을 뺏지 말게나!
나는 당신이 &font_mana;마법&font_end;에 적합한지 모르겠다네… 이 결정이 확실한가?
난 정말 고된 하루를 보냈소, 돌아가시오!
그래, 그렇다면 당신은 내가 준 &font_mana;주문&font_end;책을 보고 이해할 수 있겠소?
여기 있소. 기억하시오, 주문을 배우기 위해서는, 당신은 전 단계의 마법을 알고 있어야 하오…
오…! 당신은 %1$s을(를) 가지고 있군요! 곧 어마어마한 일이 닥칠겁니다. %1$s이(가) 유일한 해결책입니다…
안녕하세요! 당신은 "&font_green;\*&font_end;" 장비를 강화하고 싶나요?&br;&br;장비를 재활용하고 싶나요?&br;&br;나는 원석으로 부터 괴들을 만들 수 있어요.&br;&br;나에게 말만 하면 최선을 다할게요!&br;&br;기억하세요, 나는 장착한 아이템들은 불가능하다구요.
미안해요, 당신은 강화 가능한 아이템들을 가지고 있지 않군요…

잠깐! 당신은 출입이 허가 되지 않았다네!&br;&br;&font_gold;왕&font_end;에게 허락을 맡은 분만이 들어갈 수 있다네!
반갑다네! &font_gold;왕&font_end;에게 받은 &font_cyan;편지&font_end;를 가지고 있다고 했는가?&br;&br;&font_stone;성&font_end;으로 들어오게나, 그리고 전달해주게…
나는 자네가 &font_gold;왕&font_end;으로 부터 &font_gold;옥쇄&font_end;를 받았다는 것을 알고있소. 나에게 &font_cyan;%1$d &font_end;옥쇄를 준다면, 나는 &font_gold;왕&font_end;의 &font_iron;방패&font_end;를 주겠소.&br;&br;가지고 싶소?
당신은 충분한 &font_gold;옥쇄&font_end;가 없소… &font_cyan;%1$d&font_end;개를 모으고 다시 오시오!
나는 이 &font_cyan;노예&font_end;를 처형해야 한다, 비키지 않으면 나의 칼 맛을 보게 해주마!
나는 %1$s! 이것은 나의 다리다! 지나가고 싶다면, 나에게 &font_gold;%2$d 골드&font_end;를 내거나, 나에게 죽어라!

%1$s을(를) 주셔서 감사합니다! 이것으로 뭘 할 수 있을지 연구하고 있어요. 감사합니다!

거대한 &font_pyramid;스핑크스 &font_end;를 보며 그것의 크기와 웅장함에 놀랍니다. 상당히 오래된 것 처럼 보입니다.

They are the most adaptable and flexible of the common races. Their alignment resides in the fine line between good and evil. They are balanced in fighting and magic and have an innate knowledge of crafting, and are natural explorers.

They used to live under the mountains just caring about their mines and beers, but due to the recent spreading of evil in the world, many have started to explore the world to live their own legends like their ancestors did in the past. They are one of the strongest races, having great mining skills, and they are the only ones capable of crafting Beer.

Even though they have appeared on books and stories, almost no one has seen one in their life, as Halflings are peaceful people who live in their own hidden villages, cooking, eating, reading about stories from the first era, and living all kinds of fantasy in their minds. Since evil has started spreading around the world, some of the most brave Halfling have started their own adventures like the ones they read on their books.

They take delight in life, enjoying every moment of invention, exploration and investigation. They used to be focused just on their inventions, and exploration, but recently many brave Gnomes have been seen adventuring around the world.

Elves are magical people of otherworldly grace, living in the world but not entirely part of it. Selfish and egocentric, they are worried about their future due to the increased presence of evil, so they have started to become more present in the world in search for their salvation.

Generally known as the evil version of the regular elves. They are extremely intelligent, charismatic and dexterous, but share surface elves\' comparative frailty and slight frames. They are characterized by white or silver hair and obsidian black skin.

Once living humans brought to life in a horrifying state of undeath through the practice of necromantic magic. They have great strength and intelligence but lack of speed. Their hunger increases faster than the other races, but they can eat corpses to restore Mana, Hunger, and Health.

Bestial and savage, orcs band together as trıbes, living on hunting and raiding. As lovers of war, they have found a great enemy in the evil that has recently spread around the world. They have started to relate to other races with whom they had only spoken in the language of weapons and magic not so long ago.

They are semi-aquatic reptilian humanoids. Their skin was covered in scales and varied in color from dark green through to shades of brown and gray. The most brave of them have been travelling around the world, finding other places to expand their lifes and be able to help in the destruction of evil.
A strange being who no one has ever seen before. Balanced, smart, and able to adapt to any situation, their purpose in life is a mystery.
Can see the surrounding tiles when moving around, making it easier to explore.
